description: Task 2.6 complete: Symbol importance ranking with PageRank. Analyzes call graph to identify critical symbols (authenticate, main_handler, core utilities). Uses networkx to compute PageRank scores, normalizes to 0-1, classifies into tiers (low/medium/high/critical). Detects entry points (high in-degree, low out-degree). Fields: importance_score, importance, is_entry_point. All 63 tests passing (20 Phase 1 + 43 Phase 2). symbols.py at 84% coverage. Perfect for identifying hotspots and architectural pivots.
